topic.title: Change TA1600/2400/3200’s IP Address Using Analog Phones
topic.shortdesc: By default, TA1600/2400/3200 obtains a dynamic IP address from the DHCP server. You can change the device’s IP address via the analog phone which is connected to the FXS port.

body.p:
There are 3 modes supported on TA1600/2400/3200 access the internet.
DHCP
Static IP Address
PPPoE

section.title: Set a static IP address for TA1600/2400/3200.

ol.li: Press *** to enter the voice menu.
Press 3 to enter the Advanced Settings.
Enter the password follow by the pound key: 123456#.The default password is 123456.
Press 2 to change the IP address.
Press 2 to enable the static IP.
Press 1 to change the IP address and follow by the new IP address 192*168*10*125.
Press 2 to change the subnet mask and follow by the new subnet mask 255*255*255*0.
Press 3 to change the gateway and follow by the new gateway 192*168*10*1.
Press 4 to change the DNS and followed by the new DNS 8*8*8*8.
Press 5 to reboot the device. After reboot, you can access the device by the new IP address.
